<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets group icon properties. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''setGroupIcon''' [id, icon, offset] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [id, icon, offset] : [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] - The icon ID returned by [[addGroupIcon]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> icon: [[String]] - Class name of desired icon from CfgGroupIcons </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> offset: [[Array]] (Optional) - X and Y offsets of the icon in form [offsetX, offsetY] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_target [[setGroupIcon]] [_icon, "hc_selectedEnemy"];
_target [[setGroupIcon]] [_icon, "flag"];
_grp [[setGroupIcon]] [_iconsize, _iconsizeclass, _offset];
_grp [[setGroupIcon]] [_newid, _icon, _offset];
_grp [[setGroupIcon]] [_icon, _iconclass];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
